## :seedling: Research Plan

### 1. What is the aim of this research?
- どんな問題を解きたいか
- :bulb: Clarify what problem this research focuses on

### 2. Why we should focus on the problem
- なぜその問題を解くべきか

### 3. What makes the problem challenging?
- その問題を（既存のアプローチで）解くことはなぜ難しいのか

### 4. Key Idea(s) to address the difficulty
- ↑の難しさを解決するキーアイデア|コンセプトは何か

### 5. How the ideas solve the difficulty
- キーアイデアはどのように難しさを解決するのか？

### 6. How we can evaluate the effectiveness of the key ideas (e.g. metric, dataset)
- 提案手法の有効性はどのように評価できるか. 評価指標はなにか
- :bulb: Come up with **a minimal example (toy problem)** that validates the concept

## :calendar:  Milestones
- :warning: You can use [GitHub Milestones](https://docs.github.com/en/issues/using-labels-and-milestones-to-track-work/creating-and-editing-milestones-for-issues-and-pull-requests) on demand
- `5E` survey & research plan
- ...
- `10E` complete paper draft v0
- `11M` {conference name} deadline
